amendment.description: To increase funding for 1890 land-grant colleges, with an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3582 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3582 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5500) To increase funding for 1890 land-grant colleges, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3582 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3582 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
